h2_title: Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide
content: Along with these attacks, the mantis will sometimes fly up and start to slash its blades, but send out projectiles instead. Its combos will become more agile, and it will often spin around again and again with its blades creating circles around it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Emerald-Armed_Mantis.md', within the main section titled 'Emerald-Armed Mantis', specifically from the subsection 'Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Along with these attacks, the mantis will sometimes fly up and start to slash its blades, but send out projectiles instead. Its combos will become more agile, and it will often spin around again and again with its blades creating circles around it.
